Name: shweta rastogi
Review:
return policy


Maine JBL Go bluetooth speaker 5 Feb 19 ko order Kia tha.. 9 Feb 19 ko deliver Hua.. 5 March 19 se bluetooth speaker phone k sath connect nhi Hua..  one year warranty me h.. kese replace kru.. pls suggest kyunki return window 19 Feb 19 ko close ho chuki h
